Returns: the actual bitmap config used. This value will never be null.
getActualConfig().Description: Get the actual bitmap config used to decode the bitmap after the decoding.

MediaMetadataRetriever.BitmapParams().Description: Create a default BitmapParams object. By default, it uses @B_android#graphics#Bitmap#Config#ARGB_8888_E@ as the preferred bitmap config.

Returns: the preferred bitmap config. This value will never be null.
getPreferredConfig().Description: Retrieve the preferred bitmap config in the params.

Parameters: Bitmap.Config: the preferred bitmap config to use. This value must never be null.
setPreferredConfig(android.graphics.Bitm.Description: Set the preferred bitmap config for the decoder to decode into. If not set, or the request cannot be met, the decoder will output in @B_android#graphics#Bitmap#Config#ARGB_8888_E@ config by default. After decode, the actual config used can be retrieved by @B_android#media#MediaMetadataRetriever#BitmapParams#getActualConfig_E@.
